ygData.subject: Re: specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: well, considering all my discliplines except conjuration are around 110, i ll miss that =P. and trust me, when you hit lvl 20, you want your conjuraion to be
ygData.messageBody:
well, considering all my discliplines except conjuration are around 110,
i'll miss that =P. and trust me, when you hit lvl 20, you want your
conjuraion to be higher than 50, you fiz a LOT if it's low when trying to
cast the lvl 20 pet... at least, i do =)

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 21st lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

>They can't go any higher than 50 I think. Its not exactly like your
>crippled though.
>Having a 50 in other areas I would hope will definatly help you.
>
>Its just that you can't be a master of many disciplines, just one.
>
>Azboklin
